thread.title: My Name
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by My Name

author: My Name
title: My Name
text: David Sklar has no interest in the clients they are serving. They don't make clear how they calculate what is owing including their fees. Any opportunity for you to pay the creditor more they'll grab. They never fight for your right. You end up paying more than the original interest. Only thing that happens is the calls stop.
